definition: to leave a political party/to give up party membership
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
party/association/club/society/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Dang

sentences.english: He defected from his own party and joined the Socialists.
sentences.chinese: 他脱党转而参加了社会党。

sentences.english: Several labour mps break away to join the social democrats.
sentences.chinese: 有些工党下议院议员脱党后加入社会民主党。

sentences.english: Several Labour MPs broke away to join the Social Democrats.
sentences.chinese: 有些工党下议院议员脱党后加入社会民主党。
